responses: The Ultimate Investment Banking Course is available on Udemy. You can find it here: https://www.udemy.com/ultimate-investment-banking-course/
The 'Trading Penny Stocks: A Guide for All Levels' course is available on Udemy. It's a great resource for learning how to trade penny stocks.

- Beginner to Pro - Financial Analysis in Excel
- Financial Modeling for Business Analysts
